item.description:
Please notice time and date change.  Due to the weather forecast we will hike on Friday night starting at 6:30 p.m..  Malcolm reports that he went to the Powder Point Bridge and found the parking lot clear and open. However the bridge was closed for repair. He was informed they don't want anyone using it with a vehicle or on foot.

So we will postpone the Duxbury beach hike and go to Long Beach in Plymouth instead.  We will meet near Sandy's restaurant at 6:30  and hike from there.

Looking forward to seeing you.

group.name: Friends of Myles Standish State Forest Meetup Group

item.name: Bony Moon Hike at Long Beach, Plymouth
